subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[encampment]]; [[barracks]]
# {{lb|zh|military}} [[battalion]]
# [[camp]]; [[activity]]; [[event]]
# to [[encamp]]
# to [[build]]; to [[construct]]
# to [[operate]]; to [[run]]
# to [[manage]]; to [[handle]]
# to [[seek]] for; to [[seek]]
# to [[measure]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * {{sense|military}} Under the {{w|National Revolutionary Army}}, a [[battalion]] was composed of three or four [[companies]] ({{zh-l|連}}). In turn, for [[infantry]] [[regiment]]s, three infantry battalions formed a regiment ({{zh-l|團}}), in infantry.
